files.name: main.py
files.content:
print("I am thinking of a number between 1 and 20")
import random
x=random.randint(1,20)
guess=random.randint(5,10)
y=1
print("You have",guess,"guesses.")
print("")

while(y<=guess):
  y=str(y)
  check=input('Guess #'+y+"?")
  check=int(check)
  y=int(y)
  if(check==x):
    print('Yes!')
    break
  elif(check>x):
    print(check,"is too high")
    y=y+1
  elif(check<x):
    print(check,"is too low")
    y=y+1
print("The secret number was",x)
